home.subtitle: Experience unity and faith as we come together in worship strengthening our bond with God and one another in love and grace.
home.counselingDescription: Mondays and Tuesdays, 10:00 am-4:00 pm. Brother Fikire Getachew is available for counseling and prayer.

footer.churchDescription: Building stronger connections through worship and faith.

services.bibleStudyDesc: Join us every Wednesday at 6:30 PM for our community Bible study session.
services.sundayServiceDesc: Our main worship service takes place every Sunday at 10:00 AM. All are welcome!

announcements.bibleStudyDescription: Join us every Wednesday at 6:30 PM for our community Bible study session.
announcements.sundayServiceDescription: Our main worship service takes place every Sunday at 10:00 AM. All are welcome!

events.title: Events
events.metaDescription: Upcoming events and activities at our church
events.heroSubtitle: Join us for worship, fellowship, and service
events.upcomingDescription: Check out our calendar of events and mark your dates to join us!
events.regularDescription: Our weekly schedule of services and activities
events.sundayServiceDesc: Join us for our weekly worship service with preaching, prayer, and fellowship.
events.bibleStudyDesc: Deep dive into God's Word with our community Bible study session.
events.prayerNightDesc: Corporate prayer gathering for church needs, community, and nations.
events.outreachDesc: Serving our community through practical help and sharing God's love.
events.conferenceDesc: Annual summer conference with guest speakers, worship, and fellowship.
events.youthCampDesc: Summer camp for youth with activities, teachings, and spiritual growth.

ministries.title: Ministries
ministries.metaDescription: Explore our church ministries and find where you can serve
ministries.heroSubtitle: Find your place to serve and grow
ministries.ourMinistriesDesc: We offer various ministries to help you connect, grow, and serve within our church community.
ministries.getInvolvedDesc: We would love to help you find the perfect ministry where you can use your gifts and grow in faith.
ministries.childrensDesc: Engaging programs for children to learn about God's love through stories, games, and activities.
ministries.youthGroupDesc: A dynamic community for teenagers to grow in faith, build relationships, and serve others.
ministries.mensFellowshipDesc: Brothers in Christ gathering for Bible study, accountability, and mutual encouragement.
ministries.womensCircleDesc: Sisters in faith meeting for prayer, study, and supporting one another through life's journeys.
ministries.prayerWarriorsDesc: Dedicated intercessors committed to praying for the church, community, and global needs.
ministries.outreachTeamDesc: Serving our local community through practical help and sharing God's love in action.

programs.title: Programs
programs.metaDescription: Join us for spiritual activities and fellowship
programs.heroSubtitle: Please join us for these spiritual activities and fellowship!
programs.counselingDesc: Brother Fikire Getachew is available for counseling and prayer.
programs.eveningPrayerDesc: Join us for our weekly evening prayer session.
programs.chainPrayerDesc: Participate in our chain prayer and fasting throughout the morning.
programs.bibleMarathonDesc: Covering the books of Genesis to Revelation.
programs.bibleStudyDesc: Join us for Bible study at two locations.
programs.worshipServiceDesc: Worship service and preaching, conducted in Amharic, Tigrigna, and Afan Oromo.
programs.fastingPrayerDesc: Monthly day of fasting, prayer, and fellowship.
programs.annualConferencesDesc: We hold biannual conferences, one around Christmas and another in the summer.
programs.firstSundayTime: First Sunday of each month: 10:00 AM - 1:30 PM CST
programs.note1: All services are open to everyone. Visitors are always welcome!
programs.note2: For directions to our Metairie and Westbank locations, please contact the church office.
programs.note3: Children's Sunday School runs concurrently with our main worship service.
programs.note4: For more information about our biannual conferences, please check our events page or contact church leadership.
programs.joinUsDesc: We'd love to have you join us for worship, prayer, and fellowship. Experience the warmth of our church community.
